ygData.subject: RE: Re: bronze breast plate
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I held the king room last night for 4 hours with a druid friend of mine. Total goblins killed = (20 min spawn for 5 goblins, 15 goblins per hour, 60
ygData.messageBody:
>Get a party together and hit permafrost.
>The gobs there drop medium bronze.

I held the king room last night for 4 hours with a druid friend
of mine.

Total goblins killed = (20 min spawn for 5 goblins, 15 goblins per
hour, 60 goblins total - we killed each under 30 seconds so yes
technicially while the goblin lives the spawn counter doesnt start
over, so this is an estimate =P )

Total bronze pieces: 2.

The bronze load is _not_ common as some people think, it is uncommon
load (I assume I just got unlucky this night, so I wont mark it rare)
But this isn't the first time I've camped the room and seen little or
no bronze.

One hour in SolB, I had a complete suit save legs.

Harmonic Distortion, 38th unchained melody.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
